Event.Text: After 20 minutes of card playing later, disappointment washed across Miles face as he continued on a huge losing streak. Soon enough, the other gamblers laugh at each other, saying to Miles ”Jeez guy, you may be good at bluffin but you sure aint good at playing. If we ever catch up again, we gotta play one more time.” We left our bet with them, and we headed back to the rover, and headed out.
